parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description:
The name of the event.

>  You can call the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) operation to query the names of events.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the IDs.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: UniqueInfo
parameters.description: The ID of the alert event.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server to query.

>  You can call the [DescribeSuspEvents](~~DescribeSuspEvents~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
